alert.note: Alert for West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 2:30AM PST until January 04 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches over the higher passes with local accumulations up to 18 inches across the higher peaks. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Western Plumas County/Lassen Park and West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada including Interstate 80 over Donner Pass, Highway 50 over Echo Summit and Highway 88 over Carson Pass. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 4 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery and snow covered road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow level 5000 to 6000 feet today, lowering to 3500 to 4500 feet on Wednesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
